mapper.select: select c.id,c.author,c.title,c.type,c.status,c.description,c.seal_rank,c.seal_rank_time,c.source,c.auth,c.start_time,c.end_time,c.duration from contest c where c.id = #{cid}

SELECT c.id,c.author,c.title,c.type,c.source,c.auth,c.status,c.description,c.start_time,c.end_time,c.duration FROM contest c WHERE DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) >= DATE(start_time) AND c.status != 1 order by c.start_time ASC
